title: being banned for no reason
body: riot you gave me chat restriction for no reason you sent me a log which you made me appect and i didnt even mouth to anyone. are you serious riot?

replies.body: Yeh, it's extremely rare that people are wrongly banned (and if they are the only way to fix it is by submitting a ticket in the support section). Post the chat logs and all us GDers will be happy to point out why you were banned.

na m8 the rule is if you misspell something in this complaint post it means you're most likely 12 or too antisocial to realise how toxic you are. misspell or not even grammaring, which is both in this post, believe it or not
what the fuck did i just read?

um... I'll tell you after 3 hours of analysing?

English Translation: No mate, the rule is; if you misspell something while making a complaint post, you're most likely 12, or are not social enough to realise actually how toxic you are being. There is misspelling and bad grammar, which are both contained within this post, believe it or not, you are toxic.
Thanks mate, You should look at a career in translating for muppets!
its funny how you spell a word incorrectly and you have a 12 year old mouthing about it. oceania when will you grow up, you are the 12 year old here %%%
this is likely the reason you were banned, just look at how you speak
"pics or it didn't happen" approach, I like it
Post that log to us, prove that you are actually innocent. If you don't? Well, guilty beyond reasonable doubt.
and i do not believe that's extremely rare for people to get wrongly banned when your team continues feeding and you ask them to stop. 90% of the time the take it as an offensive jesture

It all depends on how **YOU** choose to respond to it. If you choose to respond to toxicity with toxicity then it's not a wrongful ban, is it? Fact is unless you've never actually broken **ANY** rules I can pretty much guarantee you deserve it.

If you think it was wrongful, post the chat logs and prove it.
